rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language to report scale of culling.
"confirmed" is reporting; "euthanized" is a containment verb (Rule 5 & NEW NOTE).
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports the euthanasia of birds, but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a control measure/safeguard ('250,000 birds were euthanized this week') without active reassurance.
